HomePage.resume: Passionate and dedicated Primary School Teacher with a strong foundation in early childhood and primary education. Experienced in creating engaging and inclusive learning environments that foster academic growth and character development. A collaborative educator committed to nurturing studentsâ€™ potential through creative teaching methods, effective classroom management, and continuous professional development.

services.title: Educational Projects
services.sub_title: As a student majoring in education, I actively engage in teaching-related projects such as lesson planning, tutoring, and developing creative learning media.

cta.title: Interested in collaborating?
cta.sub_title: I'm open to learning opportunities, volunteer teaching, and education-based initiatives. Feel free to reach out!

resume.paragraf_1: Hello there! Thank you for visiting my personal website. I'm Tesa Adillah, a student majoring in Primary School Teacher Education at the University of Jambi. I have a strong passion for teaching and learning. With a solid understanding of child development and educational strategies, I approach every teaching opportunity with creativity, patience, and a deep commitment to student success and well-being.
resume.paragraf_2: I focus on creating classroom environments that support growth and inspire curiosity. My skills include lesson planning, classroom management, and child-centered instruction. As an eager learner and reflective educator, I thrive in collaborative settings where I can share ideas and grow. My kind and open attitude helps me connect with students, parents, and fellow educators to create a positive learning experience for everyone.
resume.paragraf_3: Outside of academics, I actively participate in various training programs, seminars, and educational projects to broaden my perspective and enhance my teaching skills. I am also passionate about integrating technology into the learning process, utilizing interactive digital media and educational platforms to create more engaging experiences. By continuously learning and innovating. I aspire to become an adaptive and inspiring educator who brings positive impact to future generations.
